snippet.title: Xenoblade Chronicles 3 Expansion Pass – Vol. 4 Teaser (Nintendo Switch)
snippet.description:
Buy now: https://www.nintendo.co.uk/Games/Nintendo-Switch-games/Xenoblade-Chronicles-3-2168340.html?utm_medium=social&utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=XenobladeChronicles3%7CNDirectExpansionPack4Information%7Cm_id_67nkb6HVZX%7C2168340#Expansion_Pass

Here's a sneak peek of the new story scenario coming in Volume 4 of the Xenoblade Chronicles 3 Expansion Pass later this year.
